azurerm_virtual_machine_extension.description:
Manages a Virtual Machine Extension to provide post deployment
configuration and run automated tasks.

name.description: The name of the virtual machine extension peering. Changing

virtual_machine_id.description: The ID of the Virtual Machine. Changing this forces a new resource to be created

publisher.description: The publisher of the extension, available publishers

type.description: The type of extension, available types for a publisher can

type_handler_version.description: Specifies the version of the extension to

settings.description: The settings passed to the extension, these are

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The ID of the Virtual Machine Extension.

create.description: Used when creating the Virtual Machine Extension.

update.description: Used when updating the Virtual Machine Extension.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Virtual Machine Extension.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Virtual Machine Extension.
